panels.description: Total reads, ranges and cas_prepare per table

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_range_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_prepare_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Reads Throughput per Table

panels.description: Total reads, ranges and cas_prepare per node

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_range_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_cas_prepare_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Reads Throughput per Node

panels.description: Total reads, ranges and cas_prepare per node and table

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_range_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_prepare_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Reads Throughput per Node and Table

panels.description: Read latency for local reads per table (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Read Latency per Table

panels.description: Read latency for local reads per node (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Read Latency per Node

panels.description: Read latency for local reads per table and per node  (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Read Latency per Table and Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting reads

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_pending_tasks{pool_name=~"read_stage|request_response_stage|internal_response_stage|compaction_executor", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Tasks per Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting reads

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_total_blocked_tasks_total{pool_name=~"read_stage|request_response_stage|internal_response_stage|compaction_executor", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Blocked Tasks per Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting reads

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, message_type) (rate(mcac_dropped_message_dropped_total{message_type=~"read|request_response|range_slice|paged_range",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m]))

panels.title: Dropped Messages per Node

panels.description: Sum of tombstones scanned per minute, for each table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_tombstone_scanned_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Scanned Tombstones per Table

panels.description: Sum number of tombstones scanned per minute, for each node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_tombstone_scanned_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Scanned Tombstones per Node

panels.description: Number of tombstones scanned per minute, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_tombstone_scanned_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Scanned Tombstones per Table and Node

panels.description: Max of SStable hit per read, for each table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_ss_tables_per_read_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Hits per Read - Max per Table

panels.description: Max of SSTable hit per read, for each node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_ss_tables_per_read_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Hits per Read - Max per Node

panels.description: Max of SSTable hit per read, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_ss_tables_per_read_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Hit per Read - Max per Table and Node

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Table

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Node

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Table and Node

panels.description: Min of keyCache hit rates, for each table

targets.expr: min by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_key_cache_hit_rate{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: KeyCache Hit Rate - Min per Table

panels.description: Min of keyCache hit rates, for each node

targets.expr: min by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_key_cache_hit_rate{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: KeyCache Hit Rate - Min per Node

panels.description: Min of keyCache hit rates, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: min by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_key_cache_hit_rate{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: KeyCache Hit Rate - Min per Table and Node

panels.description: Caches hit rates, for each node and cache type

targets.expr: (mcac_cache_hit_rate{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Caches Hit Rates - per Node

panels.description: Caches sizes and capacities, for each node and cache type

targets.expr: (mcac_cache_size{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
(mcac_cache_capacity{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Caches sizes and capacities - per Node

panels.description: Nodes Status uses Internal/Gossip activity. Be mindful that if Native or Thrift protocol are disabled, the nodes won't be reachable, and still marked up

targets.expr: mcac_cache_hit_rate{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"} > 0

panels.title: Caches hit rates per cache type

rows.title: Key Caches Hit Rate (collected at the node level)

panels.description: Max of bloom filter false positive ratio, for each table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_bloom_filter_false_ratio{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Bloom Filter False Positive Ratio - Max per Table

panels.description: Max of bloom filter false positive ratio, for each node

targets.expr: min by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_bloom_filter_false_ratio{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Bloom Filter False Positive Ratio - Max per Node

panels.description: Max of bloom filter false positive ratio, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: min by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_bloom_filter_false_ratio{keyspace!~"system|system_distributed|system_traces|system_auth|system_schema", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Bloom Filter False Positive Ratio - Max per Table and Node

panels.description: CPU utilisation

targets.expr: (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Unix load for all nodes

targets.expr: collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}

panels.title: Unix Load (1m rate)

panels.description: Context switching rate for all nodes

targets.expr: rate(collectd_contextswitch_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])

panels.title: Context Switching

panels.description: Maximum Memory allocated per usage (worst node) - excludes caches, buffers, etc

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, memory) (collectd_memory{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Memory Utilisation

panels.description: Disk read throughput per node

targets.expr: rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_read_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])

panels.title: Disk Read Thoughput

panels.description: Network In and Out per node

targets.expr: rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])
-1 * (rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Sum of all disks hits for reads per second, for each node

targets.expr: Sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_processes_io_ops_read_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Reads IOPS - Total per Node

panels.description: Sum of all disks throughput for reads per second, for each node

targets.expr: Sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_processes_io_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Reads Throughput - Total per Node

panels.description: Percentage of the time the node is *not* doing a GC, thus Cassandra is not stopped for GC

targets.expr: 1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000)

panels.title: Application Throughput (% time NOT doing GC)

panels.description: Garbage collection duration

targets.expr: rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: JVM Heap Memory size (worst node) and minimum available heap size per node

targets.expr: mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}

min by ( cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_max{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Utilisation
